department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The acquisition of shelving units and workstations to store serviceable Aviation Life Support Equipment (ALSE) parts and tools
full_summary:
# Shelving Units for Aviation Life Support Equipment (ALSE)
## Request for Proposal

### Background

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of shelving units and workstations to store Aviation Life Support Equipment (ALSE) parts and tools at the Greenwood, Nova Scotia site.

### Scope of Work

The contractor is required to deliver reliable and durable shelving units and workstations to efficiently store serviceable ALSE parts and tools. The scope includes:

* Shelving units to accommodate various part sizes and types
* Workstations for easier access and organization
* Delivery to the specified site in Greenwood, Nova Scotia

### Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: WS4300131302
* Tender Reference Number: WS4300131302
* Publication Date: January 16, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 16, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EST ( decline-offre )
* Amendment Date: January 29, 2024

### Important Details

* Mandatory Clause: The contractor must comply with Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other applicable trade agreements.
* Language: English and French proficiency is required for the tender submission.
* Notification URL: [the provided link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18519113?extsite=MTg1MTkxMTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Gabrielle St-Hilaire-Castonguay
* Contact Email: gabrielle.st-hilairecastonguay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Evaluation Criteria

Proposal submissions will be evaluated based on Lowest Price.

## Note

This RFP is a reissue of the previous solicitation, which cancelled and superseded the previous solicitation number W0102-23502S/A dated November 9, 2023.

Please ensure to review the solicitation documentation and Annex Statement of Requirement for detailed information on this opportunity.
